mapper.select: SELECT SCHEDULENUMBER, SCHEDULEENDDATE, SCHEDULESTARTDATE FROM CALENDER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOMCLEANIMAGE (cleanNum, orgName, savedName, savedPath) VALUES (#{cleanNum}, #{orgName}, #{savedName}, #{savedPath})
mapper.update: UPDATE ROOMCLEANIMAGE SET cleannum = (SELECT cleannum FROM ROOMCLEAN ORDER BY cleannum DESC LIMIT 1) ORDER BY IMAGEID DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT C.SCHEDULENUMBER, R.ROOMNUMBER, ROOMSTATUS FROM RESERVED R JOIN CALENDER C ON R.ROOMSTATUS = '청소요청' OR ROOMSTATUS = '청소중' WHERE CURRENT_DATE() BETWEEN C.SCHEDULESTARTDATE AND C.SCHEDULEENDDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVED SET ROOMSTATUS = '청소중' WHERE ROOMNUMBER = #{roomNumber} AND ROOMSTATUS = '청소요청'
UPDATE RESERVED SET ROOMSTATUS = '청소중' WHERE ROOMNUMBER = #{roomNumber} AND ROOMSTATUS = '청소요청'
UPDATE RESERVED R INNER JOIN BOOKING B USING(ROOMNUMBER) SET R.ROOMSTATUS = CASE WHEN CURDATE() = B.CHECKOUTDATE THEN '예약가능' ELSE '재실' END WHERE R.ROOMNUMBER = #{roomNumber} AND R.ROOMSTATUS = '청소중'
UPDATE RESERVED SET ROOMSTATUS = '청소요청' WHERE ROOMSTATUS = '퇴실'
UPDATE RESERVED R INNER JOIN BOOKING B USING(ROOMNUMBER) SET R.ROOMSTATUS='퇴실' WHERE B.CHECKOUTDATE=CURDATE() AND R.RESERVATIONDATE BETWEEN B.CHECKINDATE AND B.CHECKOUTDATE
mapper.select: SELECT CHECKINDATE, ROOMNUMBER FROM booking b WHERE DATE(CHECKINDATE) = CURDATE()
